mapper.select: SELECT salt, PASSWORD, role_id AS roleId, user_phone AS userPhone, user_name AS userNme, user_pic as userPic, status FROM user_account where (user_phone = #{userAccount.userName} or user_name= #{userAccount.userName}) and role_id = #{userAccount.roleId}

SELECT u.user_uuid AS userUuid, u.user_name AS userName, u.user_phone AS userPhone, u.user_pic as userPic, u.role_id AS roleId, u.age, DATE_FORMAT(u.birthday, '%Y-%m-%d') AS birthday, u.province AS provinceV, u.city AS cityV, u.sex, p.province, c.city, u.address, u.user_tag AS userTag, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(a.article_tag) FROM article_tag a WHERE FIND_IN_SET( a.article_tag_id, u.user_tag) ) AS userTagName, u. STATUS, DATE_FORMAT( u.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i' ) AS createTime FROM user_account u LEFT JOIN province p ON p.svalue = u.province LEFT JOIN province c ON c.svalue = u.city WHERE 1 = 1
AND u.user_phone = #{userAccount.userPhone}
